name: Off Road Racing Challenge PV
description:
Challenge your Off-Road Driving Skills with this 4x4 Game.

Made for race gamers and 4x4 enthusiast.

Choose more than 10 vehicles: SUVs, Trucks and 4x4.

Drive through 8 long Off-Road tracks.

Race on Quick Race Mode, there you can select the laps and opponents.

You can also play in Championship Mode there you select a team and earn points at the end of each championship race to become the next 4x4 Off-Road champion.

Other Features:

- Without Ads
- Without In-App additional purchases
- Race with up 5 opponents
- Change up 5 laps per race
- Easy to follow tutorial
- All vehicles and tracks are unlocked from the first play
